description:
**Fix Overview**:

To prevent the icon in the search box from redirecting users to the copilot website:

1. Modify the HOST file on the system to point to the local host.
2. Ensure the HOST file is saved properly to apply the changes.

**Details**:
By updating the HOST file, you can effectively control the URL that the search box icon launches. Any attempts to access the copilot website will not succeed, thus neutralizing its impact. (LLM Synthesized)
